product_name: Maui Jim Makaha Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Makaha sunglasses protect your eyes from the savage rays and glare of the sun and feature Maui Jim PolarizedPlus(R) technology. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Front and back of lenses feature a Clearshell(R) hard coating that provides excellent scratch resistance. Extremely impact-resistant, Grilamid TR 90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature. Rimless rectangle frame shape hugs the head and compliments many face sizes. Rubber nose pads and temple ends prevent slippage. Anti-corrosive nickel/silver hinge. Maui Jim Makaha sunglasses come with a semi-rigid case and a soft pouch for cleaning and storage.
short_description: Makaha sunglasses protect your eyes from the savage rays and glare of the sun and feature Maui Jim PolarizedPlus(R) technology.
